text: How can I learn more about Python’s internals?
I have been programming using Python for slightly more than half an year now and I am more interested in Python internals rather than using Python to develop applications.
Currently I am working on porting a few libraries from Python2 to Python3.
However, I have a rather abstract view on how to make port stuff over from Python2 to Python3 as most of the changes deal with design issues in Python2.x
I'd like to learn more about Python internals; should I go for a top-down or a bottom-up approach?
Are there any references you could recommend?
